cards.title: The Goalie
powers: {TheGoalieCharacter} may deal 1 target 1 melee damage. {TheGoalieCharacter} may deal another target 1 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.
One player may draw a card now.
Put an Ongoing card from a trash on top of its deck.

cards.title: Crowding the Box
body: Whenever a non-hero target deals damage to {TheGoalieCharacter}, reduce damage dealt by that target to {TheGoalieCharacter} by 1 until the end of your next turn and increase damage dealt by {TheGoalieCharacter} to that target by 1 until the end of your next turn.

cards.title: Defensive Funnel
body: At the start of the villain turn, you may have a villain target deal {TheGoalieCharacter} 1 irreducible melee damage. If {TheGoalieCharacter} is dealt damage this way, you may play a Goalposts card from your trash.

cards.title: Extra Time
body: Search your deck and trash for a Goalposts card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
{TheGoalieCharacter} regains 4 HP.
Immediately end your turn.

cards.title: Goalie Gloves
body: Whenever a Goalposts card enters play, increase melee damage dealt by {TheGoalieCharacter} this turn by 2.
powers: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals up to 2 targets 1 melee damage each.

cards.title: Hospital Ball
body: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 4 projectile damage. You may destroy a Goalposts card.
If a Goalposts card is in play, the damaged target deals {TheGoalieCharacter} 2 irreducible melee damage.

cards.title: Huddle Up!
body: One player reveals the top 5 cards of their deck, puts 2 into their hand and the rest into their trash.
That player may play a card now. If they do, destroy a Goalposts card.

cards.title: Move the Goalposts
body: Search your deck and trash for a Goalposts card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
You may destroy an Ongoing or environment card. If you do, you may play a card or draw a card.

cards.title: Offsides!
powers: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage. You may destroy a Goalposts card. If you do, {TheGoalieCharacter} deals each non-hero target 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Out of Bounds
body: Destroy a Goalposts card.
{TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Draw 3 cards.

cards.title: Park the Bus
body: As long as a Goalposts card is in play, {TheGoalieCharacter} is immune to damage and you may not play cards or use powers.
At the start of your turn, you may destroy this card.

cards.title: Place of Power
body: Reduce damage dealt to {TheGoalieCharacter} by 1.
Increase non-melee damage dealt by {TheGoalieCharacter} by 1.
At the end of your turn, {TheGoalieCharacter} regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Return to Sender
body: The first time any hero target is dealt damage each turn, {TheGoalieCharacter} may deal the source of that damage 1 projectile damage. Then, you may destroy a Goalposts card. If you do, redirect damage dealt by that source to {TheGoalieCharacter} until the start of your turn.

cards.title: Shootout
body: Each non-hero target deals {TheGoalieCharacter} 1 projectile damage.
{TheGoalieCharacter} deals each non-hero target 3 projectile damage.

cards.title: Starting Whistle
body: Search your deck and trash for a Goalposts card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
{TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
Draw a card.

cards.title: Team Spirit
body: Each hero target regains 2 HP.
One hero may use a power now.

cards.title: Twelfth Girl
body: Once per turn, when a hero target would be dealt exactly 1 damage, you may prevent that damage.
When damage is prevented this way, up to 2 hero targets each regain 1 HP.

promoCards.title: The Goalie
powers: Play a Goalposts card from your trash. {TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 1 melee damage and 1 cold damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
Until the start of your turn, increase melee damage dealt by hero targets by 1.

openingLines.default: Get in there, team. I've got your backs.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I'd watch the five-hole if I were you.
